articles.author: Brian Quarmby
articles.title: Gamer-hate: Ubisoft’s new NFT project video gets 96% dislike ratio - Cointelegraph
articles.description: A post calling on the community to boycott Ubisoft's new NFT project has more than 13,400 upvotes on Reddit, with users slamming the firm for looking at profit potential “rather than focusing on making quality products with depth.”
articles.content:
French gaming giant Ubisoft Entertainment SAs new nonfungible token (NFT) project, Quartz, is facing strong pushback from the gaming community. 
Ubisoft unveiled the beta launch of Quartz via a brie… [+3832 chars]
